caption:
Table 1: Ablation study for boundary inheritance on 
CIFAR-10. 20 iterations PGD white-box attack is applied. 
We adopt ResNet18 as M natural for LBGAT method. 
Acc n represents accuracy on natural images while Acc r 
represents robustness of models.

Table 2: Ablation study for separate batch normalization. 
Robustness is evaluated under auto-attack.  ?denotes mod-
els trained with shared convolution and separate batch nor-
malization.

caption:
Table 8. On the more challlenging CIFAR-100 dataset, our method creates a new state-of-the-art (SOTA) on both 
robustness and natural accuracy. Specifically, our LBGAT (? = 0) model with WideResNet-34-10 architecture significantly 
outperforms previous SOAT method
